programme.title: Mental Health Television Network
programme.desc: Mental Health Television Network is dedicated to changing the way we understand and address mental health. Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: Final Draw
programme.desc: At Final Draw, everything we do is rooted in three unshakable things: God. Family. And the grind. We don't sugarcoat it. This life ain't a luxury -it's a God-given right, and we'll never take it for granted. This isn't just a show. It's who we are.

programme.title: Fauda
programme.desc: After retiring from the Israel Defense Force, Doron is working on a vineyard. He gets roped back into active duty, though, upon learning that an enemy who Doron thought his unit had killed is still alive and plans on attending his brother's wedding. Doron rejoins the IDF team with the intention of going under cover at the wedding, but the plan goes awry when the team's cover is blown. That sets into motion a chaotic chain of events and leads IDF into a manhunt to locate and kill the squad's target.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright is the patriarch of an all-male Nevada ranching family. Set during and after the Civil War, "Bonanza" is the story of life on the family's thousand-acre spread, known as the Ponderosa, near Virginia City. Ben has his three sons, each with a different (and deceased) mother. Serious eldest son Adam hopes to follow in his father's footsteps; middle son Hoss is a gentle giant -- physically strong, but sometimes naive; and youngest son Little Joe is the most impetuous and romantic of the offspring.

programme.title: Justice With Judge Mablean
programme.desc: Judge Mablean Ephriam, who presided over "Divorce Court" from 1999-2006 as the first star of the revived version of the show, returns to the courtroom genre with his half-hour series that deals with life and the law. The former Los Angeles-based prosecutor takes on the typical cases that are found on TV court shows. The arbitrator says that her show "will be life because everything we do, it involves the law."

programme.title: The Verdict With Judge Hatchett
programme.desc: Judge Glenda Hatchett presided over her self-titled courtroom show from 2000-2008. Now, she returns to the medium with "The Verdict." In the half-hour series, the Atlanta native and former juvenile-court judge rules over small-claims cases brought in front of her. Hatchett's courtroom isn't just about finding someone guilty, though. She also uses her experience dealing with young people and her tough-love approach to help send a message to out-of-control juvenile offenders to try to set them on the right track in their lives.

programme.title: Supreme Justice With Judge Karen
programme.desc: Karen Mills was a county court judge and criminal defense attorney in Florida before turning to TV to preside over her own court shows. In her third effort, "Supreme Justice," Mills tackles small-claims court arbitrations in her compassionate way, to which viewers of her previous shows have grown accustomed. As usual with court shows, cases involve friendships gone bad, money disputes and property damage.

programme.desc: A widower and his father-in-law clash, ruining a celebration of life; arguing exes damage a car and smash a phone.

programme.title: We the People With Judge Lauren Lake
programme.desc: A teacher blames a defective sleep app for getting suspended without pay; a woman seeks reimbursement for a poorly constructed custom dress.

programme.title: Equal Justice With Judge Eboni K. Williams
programme.desc: A therapist blames her loss of clients on protests targeting another business; a delayed move-in date leads to unexpected hotel expenses and storage fees.

programme.title: Equal Justice With Judge Eboni K. Williams
programme.desc: A bride sues her former friend for not showing up at her wedding after she requested extra invites; a dispute between exes over damaged property.

programme.desc: A social-media rant causes a real-estate agent to lose clients and costs a waitress her job.

programme.title: America's Court With Judge Ross
programme.desc: Woman seeks refund from her pastor after the dates change for a cruise with members of the congregation; a dispute over a ruined laptop.

programme.title: The Verdict With Judge Hatchett
programme.desc: A contractor is sued because mold removal caused damage and was left unfinished; a woman is blamed for her grandchild getting sick before a singing competition.

programme.title: The Verdict With Judge Hatchett
programme.desc: A customer refuses to pay for skydiving tickets after services were rendered; a woman sues a cosmetology student for breach of contract; a woman resists repaying her sister for the cost of their family reunion.

programme.title: Mathis Court With Judge Mathis
programme.desc: A customer drives away with a gas pump's hose still attached; a restaurant patron intentionally trips a waitress.

programme.title: Mathis Court With Judge Mathis

programme.desc: A dispute between sisters over the cost of carpet cleaning after an avoidable spill.

programme.desc: A dispute between neighbors over who should pay the medical bills after a dog bites its owner; a pet sitter is accused of locking a cat in a room for days.

programme.title: Supreme Justice With Judge Karen
programme.desc: A grandmother sues her granddaughter for euthanizing her dog while she was in a coma; a child is blamed for ruining a classmate's expensive shoes.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E4 Bulls on the Beach While the cowboys are sorting the herd, Cody suffers a close call on the job that sets off a string of bad luck as he plans his annual rodeo, Bulls on the Beach. He struggles to impress a potential sponsor and the entire event is put in jeopardy when the bulls don't arrive as scheduled. Bubba heads to Mississippi to work for his father-in-law and try his hand at office life. Booger and Jaclyn enjoy learning the first dance for their wedding, but Booger finds himself awkwardly out of place as the only man at their bridal shower!

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E5 Saddle Up or Settle Down? Bubba, Cody, and Booger have their work cut out for them removing a dangerous cow from a local rancher's herd. Bubba continues to shadow his father-in-law, making his first business pitch to a potential client. He begins to realize a life in Mississippi could prove to be very lucrative, but he isn't ready to hang up his spurs just yet. Misty convinces Cody to let her have his ranch horse for her new cattle business, requiring Cody and Booger to train a replacement colt for Cody. Booger and Jaclyn find wedding planning to be more troublesome than they anticipated.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E1 Trail of Hate Three bank robbers come to the McCain Ranch and force Lucas into helping them rob the North Fork Bank. One robber stays behind to guard Mark while the other two take Lucas to town. They threaten to kill Mark, unless Lucas cooperates with the gunmen.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E2 Woman from Hog Ridge When Lucas and Mark catch two young men stealing a horse, Lucas is forced into a shootout. He captures one of the men, but Ma Boyle's son is killed in the gunfight. Soon after the killing, the Boyle clan comes to hang the person responsible.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Prizefighter When Jim Bridger's second-in-command begins enforcing camp discipline with brutal violence, one trapper pushes back, and a showdown seems inevitable. Can Bridger intervene before the situation turns from mutual hostility into cold-blooded murder?

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E10 A Shard of Glass Haunted by the memory of leaving a man to die, mountain man Jim Bridger is determined not to repeat the mistake. When his trapping party runs out of water while crossing a barren desert, Bridger struggles desperately to keep his companions alive.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E2 The Texas Fence-Cutting War When homesteaders keep cutting down her fences to access grazing land and water, a widowed landowner teams up with famed Texas Ranger Ira Aten to protect her property. Aten hopes his explosive plan of action will force the cutters to compromise.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E11 Battle Beneath the Mountain For months, a thin wall of rock is all that keeps the peace between two rival silver mining companies 300 feet below the Idaho desert. When the barrier is finally breached, pickaxes give way to pistols and rifles, and the miners battle for five days.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E7 George Croghan: Frontier Peacemaker When Chief Pontiac organizes a coalition of Native American tribes to attack British forts, frontier trader George Croghan risks his life on a perilous journey into the wilderness to find Pontiac, negotiate a peace agreement, and prevent all-out war.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E3 Dead Ringer A gunman impersonating Jimmy as Wild Bill Hickok, robs banks in the territory. Jimmy goes undercover to find out who is framing him. To catch the gunman in the act, the riders position themselves at the next bank that he plans to rob.

programme.title: Blind Spot
programme.desc: Cheyenne rides into a small cotton town to pick up a friend's son to try to reunite a family bitterly divided by the Civil War. He soon battles hatred and greed by a vigilante gang that is holding the town captive.

programme.title: Reprieve
programme.desc: Sheriff Pinkerton deputizes Cheyenne, and he transports crook Wes McQueen to a hidden fortune. When someone shoots and kills McQueen, Cheyenne impersonates him in order to find the bounty.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E2 The Mission Captain Pender is looking for a scout and Hoss suggests former scout Charlie Trent. Charlie is less than dependable because he feels responsible for a massacre in the past. Now, he spends most of his time with a bottle.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E19 A Young Man's Fancy A pretty young girl named Sally Walker arrives on stagecoach in North Fork to visit her aunt Milly. When Mark sees her beauty, he falls in love with Sally instantly. However, she has her eyes on a boy from her past, Bruce Henry, who owns a ranch.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E20 The Man from Salinas Lucas is acting deputy while Marshal Micah Torrance is away on business. When the North Fork Bank is robbed, Lucas shoots and critically wounds Rudy Gray. Problems arise when a man posing as Gray's brother arrives in town.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E21 Two Ounces of Tin A gunman named Tip Corey, whose father was allegedly murdered in North Fork, rides into town and threatens to kill Marshal Micah Torrance. Corey gives Micah an ultimatum: take his badge off or he will end his life.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E22 Deadly Image A local rancher, who claims to be an eyewitness, accuses Lucas of murder. Townspeople are shocked until Earl Bantry, who looks like Lucas' twin, arrives in North Fork. Bantry, a ruthless criminal, threatens Mark and goes on a rampage against Lucas.

programme.title: Blue Ridge
programme.desc: Ex-Green Beret, Justin Wise, trades in his life of danger for a sheriff badge in a sleepy town at the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Now closer to his ex-wife and daughter, he's ready to settle down and embrace a life without chaos. But trouble has a way of following him. Just when he starts getting adjusted to the simple life, a murder in the community puts the residents on edge and refuels a longtime feud between two of the most powerful families. As Justin and his deputies work the case, he realizes there is more to his new home than meets the eye. Secrets unfold, and motives emerge, leading Justin on a race against time to solve the case before the townspeople take the law into their own hands.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E3 Seven A prison wagon carrying seven criminals stops in North Fork for supplies. The men escape, barricade themselves in the North Fork Saloon, and take saloon owner, Frank Sweeney, hostage. Lucas must act quickly to save Sweeney and the town from harm.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E4 The Pitchman A fast-talking con man and his teenage son stop at Lucas McCain's Ranch and try to talk their way into securing the mineral rights. However, the plan backfires when they discover the gold they thought was on the property is actually fool's gold.

programme.title: Buffalo Keepers
programme.desc: S1 E1 Today, the buffalo is the quintessential symbol of strength, freedom, and the unspoiled American West. But in the late 1800s, the nation's buffalo were nearly wiped out by ruthless hide hunters. Those majestic herds, which once numbered in the tens of millions, were down to less than 500 animals. This is the story of the handful of determined men and women who mobilized to save the ones that were left in a last-ditch effort to stave off extinction. Ranchers like Charles and Mary Ann Goodnight rescued orphaned buffalo calves and built small herds. Former buffalo hunters like Buffalo Bill helped build public sympathy. And politicians like Theodore Roosevelt helped pass laws to protect the remaining animals. The effort would be a generational one, with buffalo herds carefully tended, bred, and passed down to new stewards when their old protectors passed away. Thanks to their efforts, there are an estimated 500,000 buffalo thundering across America's grasslands once again.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E7 Doc Susie Goes Underground After the suspicious death of a tunnel worker, and unconvincing answers from the project's lead engineer, Doc Susie goes on a covert mission to find out what happened. Deep underground, she finds her own life in peril when she's trapped by a cave-in.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E10 Jim Roberts Cleans Up Jerome In his first week on the job as the new constable of Jerome, Arizona, Jim Roberts gets to work arresting the town's troublemakers and teaching his timid deputy how to be a courageous lawman as they track down a stone-cold killer and his gang.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E5 James Harrod: Kentucky's Founding Father When frontiersman James Harrod founds Harrod's Town on Native American hunting grounds in Kentucky, he soon finds his new settlement under attack. His leadership is tested as he defends the first European settlement west of the Appalachian Mountains.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E4 Blood Moon A cholera outbreak spreads fear among the townspeople of Sweetwater. They blame a defenseless, mentally disabled boy named Danny, who traveled to town with a medicine show. Now, the riders must protect him from an angry mob of citizens.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Gunmen While in Texas, Joe and Hoss are mistaken for the Slade brothers who are involved in a feud between two families. In order to stop the fighting, they decide to turn to the women of the families for help.

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: When a dispute over grazing rights to a fertile canyon leads to cattle rustling, the rustling ignites a range war, turning two brothers against one another. Will both brothers survive the deadly conflict between them?

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: It's the late 1800s and a marshal must stop a volatile and growing conflict between homesteaders and cattle drivers in his small town on the Kansas frontier.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: It's the late 1800s and a marshal must stop a volatile and growing conflict between homesteaders and cattle drivers in his small town on the Kansas frontier.

programme.title: Cavalry Charge
programme.desc: When two brothers each decide to fight on opposite sides in the Civil War, they never dreamed they would need to reunite and fight together. It is the only chance they have, if they hope to survive a brutal Indian attack.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Last Trophy A wealthy British couple visits the Ponderosa. The wife soon finds herself attracted to the toughness of the Cartwright men. She begins to think her husband is a coward and sets her sights on attracting Adam.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E10 San Francisco Ben, Hoss and Joe decide to visit San Francisco with some of their ranch hands. The hands vanish into the crowds and while searching for them, Ben finds himself shanghaied and on a ship destined for Hong Kong.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E7 Jim Clyman: Frontier Survivor When he is separated from his trapping party, frontiersman Jim Clyman is 600 miles from the nearest fort. To survive the grueling trek, he must put his fate in the hands of Native Americans, without knowing if they will help him or kill him on sight.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E8 The Gold Rush Lawman When failed prospector John Hicks Adams is elected sheriff of Santa Clara County, he must prove that he won't be a bust as a lawman too. Just weeks into the job, his courage is tested when a band of stagecoach robbers begins terrorizing the area.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E3 Pinkerton Detectives Track a Killer After a bank robbery, two Pinkerton detectives join forces to track the notorious Missouri Kid. During a shootout, the Missouri Kid kills seasoned detective Charles Schumacher, leaving young George Dougherty to finish the job and avenge his death.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E1 The Durango Brothers Hortense Durango wants her daughter, Lottie, to find a husband. While searching for six missing men, Cheyenne meets the Durango brothers and becomes a prospect for Lottie's future husband.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Annie MacGregor Story While on the trail, Annie MacGregor and her Scottish family's wagon wheel breaks. The family patriarch doesn't want any help until Major Adams' wagon train stops. Conflict arises when they practice their traditions, including playing bagpipes.

programme.title: The Last Days of Frank and Jesse James
programme.desc: When the famous James brothers give up robbing banks and attempt to live as reputable gentleman farmers, they are soon forced to seek revenge on the men who bomb their mother's house, crippling her, and killing their stepbrother.

programme.title: The Gatling Gun
programme.desc: An Apache warrior chief is willing to offer gold, and even sacrifice some of his men, to get his hands on Richard J. Gatling's powerful invention. It's up to a cavalry lieutenant, his scout, and a tough rancher to end the chief's deadly ambition.

programme.title: Cavalry Charge
programme.desc: When two brothers each decide to fight on opposite sides in the Civil War, they never dreamed they would need to reunite and fight together. It is the only chance they have, if they hope to survive a brutal Indian attack.

programme.title: Western Bound
programme.desc: Western Bound is the ultimate destination for modern and classic Western series, movies and specials.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E10 San Francisco Ben, Hoss and Joe decide to visit San Francisco with some of their ranch hands. The hands vanish into the crowds and while searching for them, Ben finds himself shanghaied and on a ship destined for Hong Kong.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E7 Jim Clyman: Frontier Survivor When he is separated from his trapping party, frontiersman Jim Clyman is 600 miles from the nearest fort. To survive the grueling trek, he must put his fate in the hands of Native Americans, without knowing if they will help him or kill him on sight.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E8 The Gold Rush Lawman When failed prospector John Hicks Adams is elected sheriff of Santa Clara County, he must prove that he won't be a bust as a lawman too. Just weeks into the job, his courage is tested when a band of stagecoach robbers begins terrorizing the area.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E3 Pinkerton Detectives Track a Killer After a bank robbery, two Pinkerton detectives join forces to track the notorious Missouri Kid. During a shootout, the Missouri Kid kills seasoned detective Charles Schumacher, leaving young George Dougherty to finish the job and avenge his death.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E1 The Durango Brothers Hortense Durango wants her daughter, Lottie, to find a husband. While searching for six missing men, Cheyenne meets the Durango brothers and becomes a prospect for Lottie's future husband.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Annie MacGregor Story While on the trail, Annie MacGregor and her Scottish family's wagon wheel breaks. The family patriarch doesn't want any help until Major Adams' wagon train stops. Conflict arises when they practice their traditions, including playing bagpipes.

programme.title: The Last Days of Frank and Jesse James
programme.desc: When the famous James brothers give up robbing banks and attempt to live as reputable gentleman farmers, they are soon forced to seek revenge on the men who bomb their mother's house, crippling her, and killing their stepbrother.

programme.title: The Gatling Gun
programme.desc: An Apache warrior chief is willing to offer gold, and even sacrifice some of his men, to get his hands on Richard J. Gatling's powerful invention. It's up to a cavalry lieutenant, his scout, and a tough rancher to end the chief's deadly ambition.

programme.title: The Gun and the Pulpit
programme.desc: The captivating tale of a smooth-talking gunslinger posing as a preacher to hide from his enemies. He ends up bringing hope to his parishioners and law-and-order to a town terrorized by crooks.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E13 Stagecoach Mary While working as a groundskeeper at a convent in Ohio, former slave Mary Fields forms a deep friendship with the superior, Mother Amadeus Dunne. When Mother Amadeus falls ill after traveling to Montana to open a girls' school, Mary rushes to her rescue and nurses her back to health. Mary soon discovers that the Western Frontier satisfies her free-spirited nature, and she decides to stay in Montana for good. She secures a contract to deliver mail by stagecoach for the U.S. Postal Service, becoming the first African American woman to carry mail. With a fearless attitude and multiple firearms, she protects the mail from would-be bandits and is soon known far and wide. Some years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson meets Sister Amadeus and gets the true story of Stagecoach Mary.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Kid The Kid becomes part of a group of six Pony Express riders in the Old West based at the Sweetwater Station in the Nebraska territory. He meets station master, Teaspoon Hunter, and fellow riders, Buck, Jimmy, Ike, Cody and Lou.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E19 Shivaree A young couple traveling to Yuma to get married come across Aaron Pelser's wagon train. Pelser and his group take things too far by forcing them to marry in North Fork, which is not the friendly spirit for a shivaree. Lucas steps in to help.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E20 The Deadeye Kid After witnessing a murder, 16 year-old Donnel O'Mahoney panics and comes to the McCain Ranch. A posse is on the hunt for the young man, believing he commited the crime. Mark befriends and hides O'Mahoney, who is traveling west from New York.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Bandit Queen Once a feared gunfighter and sheriff, the legendary Bat Masterson is now working as a newspaperman. He heads west again to uncover the real story of Pearl Hart, the first woman to rob a stagecoach in the Old West. Masterson tracks down Pearl's partner-in-crime, Joe Boot, who shares every daring and surprising detail from his wild days with the notorious Bandit Queen. In a time when outlaws and gunslingers captured the fascination of the American public, Pearl Hart was living proof that in the Wild West a woman could be just as infamous as a man.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Dalton Gang Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter and sheriff, is now working as a newspaperman. He heads west again to uncover the real story behind the most brazen bank robbery of the Old West. Masterson tracks down the sole survivor of the Dalton Gang, who relives the horrible day when they attempted to rob two banks at the same time. The youngest of the Dalton brothers, Emmett Dalton describes how the gang was gunned down as they tried to make their getaway. Despite numerous gunshot wounds, Emmett lived to serve his time in prison and renounce his life of crime.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E5 The Outlander Cheyenne's travels take him to a small town called Paradise Springs. Instead of a warm welcome, angry townspeople confront him and quickly run him out of town. However, perplexed by his cruel treatment, he returns to uncover the reason behind it.

programme.title: The Legend of 5 Mile Cave
programme.desc: A boy enchanted with tales from the Old West unlocks a mystery that could save their family farm. While his widowed mother struggles to avoid foreclosure, a mysterious stranger arrives looking for a room to rent. A bond with the boy grows as the drifter recounts breathtaking stories of Shooter Green, a legendary gunslinger accused of Arizona's biggest gold robbery. The truth is revealed, along with the secret of the drifter's past when a crooked lawman appears, hot on the trail of the stolen gold. Past and present collide in this tale of action, adventure and drama. Stars Adam Baldwin (The Last Ship, Full Metal Jacket, The Patriot), Jeremy Sumpter (Peter Pan, Soul Surfer), Jill Wagner (Braven, Christmas Cookies), and Jet Jurgensmeyer (Last Man Standing, American Sniper).

programme.title: High Lonesome
programme.desc: A sudden and swift series of murders occurs in southwestern Texas, sending Big Bend country into a frenzy. All parties are suspicious of a young rambler who just moved to the area, believing his presence must be related to the crimes.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E18 Hostages to Fortune On Halloween, Mark and his friends wear masks and go from ranch to ranch to play pranks. Knowing the boys will be blamed, rustlers wear similar masks to steal cattle. Lucas thinks the boys are mixed up in the theft, until he finds out the truth.

programme.title: Suddenly
programme.desc: Three gangsters converge on a small town and invade a family home on the top of a hill near the railroad station. They are planning to assassinate the President of the United States. - This classic suspense film will keep you on the edge of your seat.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E7 Duel of Honor Italian Count Alfredo Di Montova comes to North Fork. His unique clothing attracts the attention of town bully Sim Groder. When Groder pushes the count too far, Montova initiates a duel, and asks Lucas to assist with the rules.

programme.title: The Gun and the Pulpit
programme.desc: The captivating tale of a smooth-talking gunslinger posing as a preacher to hide from his enemies. He ends up bringing hope to his parishioners and law-and-order to a town terrorized by crooks.

programme.title: Suddenly
programme.desc: Three gangsters converge on a small town and invade a family home on the top of a hill near the railroad station. They are planning to assassinate the President of the United States. - This classic suspense film will keep you on the edge of your seat.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E7 Duel of Honor Italian Count Alfredo Di Montova comes to North Fork. His unique clothing attracts the attention of town bully Sim Groder. When Groder pushes the count too far, Montova initiates a duel, and asks Lucas to assist with the rules.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E6 Tying the Knot When a cow goes rogue and plants herself in the middle of a pond, Booger and Cody rely on their roping skills to pull her out. Bubba is feeling pressured to give up the cowboy way of life when he is offered the opportunity to take over the management of his father-in-law's company. Misty attempts to buy cows from a notoriously tough trading-cattle owner, who also happens to be her brother-in-law. Booger and Jaclyn plan the finishing touches for their wedding, and everyone joins together to celebrate their special day.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E7 All for One or One for Himself Booger and Jaclyn enjoy a romantic beach getaway for their honeymoon and discuss their new life together. Misty and Cody contemplate a business partnership. To celebrate their anniversary, Bubba and Kaley take a trip to Mississippi, and Bubba begins to warm up to the idea of relocating there permanently to work with Kaley's father. However, Bubba's reluctance to tell Booger and Cody about the job offer from his father-in-law causes tensions to boil over, leaving the future of their business, and their friendship, uncertain.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E5 Strange Town Prisoner Bletch Droshek escapes from Marshal Micah Torrance, and leaves him beaten on a barbed-wire fence. Torrance stumbles to the McCain Ranch and deputizes Lucas to apprehend Droshek at a mining camp run by his brother.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E6 Baranca A Mexican bandit named Baranca and his gang ride into North Fork looking for Bro Hadley, who murdered a Mexican farmer and burned down his home. Baranca finds Hadley and intends to get justice by executing him. However, Lucas intervenes just in time.

programme.title: Legal Action
programme.desc: Big-city lawyer Casey McKay, (Eric Close - Nashville, Without a Trace) a winner with a long hot streak, didn't expect the mysterious text from his ex-wife, Pru, (Tanya Clarke - A Beautiful Mind, Guiding Light) about her brother, Jay. No stranger to being on the wrong side of the law, Jay is accused of murdering a District Attorney. Casey takes the case, but soon discovers this will be no ordinary legal defense. Teaming up with eccentric ex-marine turned motel owner and P.I. "Ex" Clemens, (Nick Searcy - Justified, The Shape of Water) he discovers a web of conspiracy that puts him face-to-face with the town's most greedy and corrupt land developer, Mr. Gates (Tommy Flanagan - Sons of Anarchy, Braveheart). As Casey begins to unravel the truth, he finds himself fighting for his former brother-in-law's life, as well as his own.

programme.title: Far Haven
programme.desc: In 1887, Hunter Braddock moves back to Far Haven, Arizona to start over with his two young children, but when his father-in-law is brutally attacked he must take on the corrupt forces strangling the town in order to protect what he loves most.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E1 The Rebellion Cheyenne travels to Mexico to deliver freight. He soon becomes entangled in a murder plot, and the brutal leader of the French troops forces Cheyenne to stand against him. Mexican rebels, including an old foe, rescue him.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E2 Trial by Conscience Newly deputized, Cheyenne brings law and order to a small town after the murder of its sheriff. Once there, he uses an old stage trick from the play "Hamlet" to bring a corrupt businessman to justice for murder.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E3 Badge Without Honor Gerald Eskith comes to town claiming to be a deputy marshal. He plans to take the Cartwrights' friend, Jason Blaine, to San Francisco to testify against the Murdock gang. Adam is suspicious and goes along with them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E23 The Debt While Marshal Micah Torrance is transporting a prisoner to his execution, he meets Lucas and Mark on the trail. When Mark reocognizes the convict is the same man who saved his life three years earlier, he disobeys his father and helps him escape.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E24 Tinhorn Mark and Milly are shocked that Lucas has taken up gambling. However, they don't know that a good friend is in danger of losing his farm to a professional gambler and has asked Lucas to help. Lucas goes undercover to get to the bottom of things.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E25 None So Blind Mark befriends Lafayette Blye, a blind banjo-playing man. Blye tells Mark he's hunting the man responsible for his blindness. Meanwhile, veterinarian John J. Mack tells Lucas he needs to destroy his herd. It turns out Mack is the man Blye is seeking.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E26 Jealous Man Micah's friends, Jake Owens, and his pretty wife, Fay, are Lucas' new neighbors. Jake is wildly jealous of Fay and wrongly imagines Lucas and Fay are having a romance. Jake soon threatens to kill Lucas, which almost leads to his own death instead.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E26 Jealous Man Micah's friends, Jake Owens, and his pretty wife, Fay, are Lucas' new neighbors. Jake is wildly jealous of Fay and wrongly imagines Lucas and Fay are having a romance. Jake soon threatens to kill Lucas, which almost leads to his own death instead.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E8 Happy Trails Booger and Cody struggle to pen two bulls in need of a veterinary check-up. Cody gets soaked when he fails to heed Booger's prediction of a rainstorm, sparking Booger to try his hand at delivering the local weather forecast. Bubba decides to accept the job with his father-in-law in Mississippi and he makes a handmade gift for Cody and Booger to soften the blow when he breaks the news to them. The trio takes on one last big job to benefit a neighbor in need. Bubba and Kaley host a final cookout before they pack up and leave for Mississippi.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S3 E1 My Heart's in Alabama It's time for the cowboys to ride into new pastures as they explore growing their cattle business in unexpected ways. Bubba has been making good money working for his father-in-law's company in Mississippi, but he realizes he'd rather be out of his office chair and back on his horse in Alabama. Cody is excited to be managing a big rodeo, but a steer mishap puts the future of his contract on the ropes. And, even though Booger has happily saddled up with Jaclyn, it's unfamiliar terrain for him when she starts adding a woman's touch to his bachelor pad. As the three cowboys get together to sort yearlings for a friend, they devise a plan for making BBQ sauce to expand their cooking skills and company.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E7 The Martinet Cavalry Captain Josiah Perry, a disciplined military man, learns his son, Lon, died in a North Fork gunfight with Lucas. Perry is bent on making Lucas pay for Lon's death. Perry's other son, Ben, tries to keep his dad from facing the same fate.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E8 Miss Milly A young, naïve woman who doesn't have any business experience comes to North Fork and purchases the general store from Hattie Denton. A newcomer and his partner con her by posing as collection agents, putting the town's citizens in danger.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E1 They Killed Me Frontiersman Jim Bridger spins an incredible tale to a group of settlers, claiming he was once killed by Blackfeet warriors yet somehow lived to tell the tale. They think he's joking, but Bridger soon proves that he really did rise from the dead.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E4 Brothers in Arms When they are ambushed by a Blackfeet war party, Jim Bridger and a lone Shoshone brave must work together to find a way to defeat their common enemy. If they can't overcome their suspicions and learn to trust each other, they may not survive the day.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E9 Last Shot at the OK Corral In an odd twist of fate, photographers C.S. and Mollie Fly decide to open a studio next to a dusty corral in Tombstone, Arizona, and they end up taking the last shot of the Old West's most infamous gunbattle, the Shootout at the O.K. Corral.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Bone War It's not gold that inspires a rush of treasure hunters to flood the windblown bluffs of Wyoming: it's bones. After stumbling upon a strange fossil, a man is caught in the crossfire of rival paleontologists warring over a trove of dinosaur bones.

programme.desc: 2/8. Bree's birthday takes an unexpected turn. Lucy is excited to focus on someone new. Contains strong language, some sexual content and some violence. [S,AD]

programme.desc: Join Gethin Jones, Helen Skelton, Michelle Ackerley and the team for conversation, advice and tips to make your day that little bit easier.

programme.title: Crimewatch Caught
programme.desc: How the online brags of a drugs gang exploiting teenagers led to their downfall. And when a brave victim reports historic sex abuse, a determined detective fights for justice.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Featuring a Kent house with not one, but two front doors. Will it be twice as much work or double the profit? Plus, two fascinating Welsh auction lots.

programme.title: Scam Interceptors
programme.desc: 2/15. The team try to stop a Preston student from handing over money to scammers who have told her that they are from the UK's National Crime Agency.

programme.title: Lost and Found in the Lakes
programme.desc: 14/16. The team take on one of their toughest searches for a bracelet lost in a heart-sinking moment. Social media expert Mui also attempts to return a recovered phone. [S,AD]

programme.title: Escape to the Country

programme.title: Garden Rescue

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: 22/25. Amanda Holden hosts this exciting quiz show, packed with strategy, high stakes and surprises, where players must outsmart each other to win big.

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: 20/55. Alexander Armstrong is joined by co-host Phil Wang for the quiz where contestants try to score as few points as possible by coming up with the answers no-one else could think of.

programme.title: Bad for Each Other
programme.desc: Dr. Tom Owen (Charlton Heston) is an Army doctor on leave to visit his mother, who still lives in the poor Pennsylvania mining town where he grew up. After falling in love with wealthy socialite Helen Curtis (Lizabeth Scott), Tom turns down a position as the local doctor and takes a lucrative job at an elite Pittsburgh clinic. Though he's happy with his newfound success and his recent engagement to Helen, a cave-in at the town mine forces Tom to decide where his heart really lies.

programme.title: The Wyoming Kid
programme.desc: Slick gambler James Wylie (Dennis Morgan) is apprehended by the law and given the option to forgo a prison sentence if he poses as a bandit. His mission is to uncover the identity of the Poet, a notorious outlaw who has been holding up bank-owned stagecoaches and leaving verses at the crime scenes to taunt the authorities. James finds time to woo the Poet's lovely wife, Ann (Jane Wyman), who initially cold-shoulders him. But, as a romance develops, they partner up to find the robber.

programme.title: Feudin' Rhythm
programme.desc: A snooty sponsor wants the star (Eddy Arnold) of a country-western radio show fired because she wants him kept away from her nephew, who happens to be the singer's son.

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: Charlie (Charles Chaplin) wins boxing matches by placing a horseshoe in his glove.

programme.title: Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid programming.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid Returns
programme.desc: Pancho and the Kid attempt to prove that they did not kidnap the child they are protecting from a killer.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick, an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible; his simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid programming.

programme.title: Paid Programming - SharkNinja-Get Shark Power Detect
Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: The railroad president decides to scrap the Cannonball himself.

programme.title: Bad for Each Other
programme.desc: Dr. Tom Owen (Charlton Heston) is an Army doctor on leave to visit his mother, who still lives in the poor Pennsylvania mining town where he grew up. After falling in love with wealthy socialite Helen Curtis (Lizabeth Scott), Tom turns down a position as the local doctor and takes a lucrative job at an elite Pittsburgh clinic. Though he's happy with his newfound success and his recent engagement to Helen, a cave-in at the town mine forces Tom to decide where his heart really lies.

programme.title: Shine on Harvest Moon
programme.desc: At one time not so long ago, Milt Brower (William Farnum) and Pa Jackson (Stanley Andrews) were peaceable partners in a thriving cattle business. Now divided, the two are engaged in an embittered land dispute that turns ugly when Jackson accuses Brower of the dastardly crime of cattle rustling. Faithful cowboy Roy Rogers (Roy Rogers) steps in to defend his old friend Brower, making him a hero in the eyes of Brower's doting and dainty daughter, Claire (Mary Hart).

programme.title: The Fastest Gun Alive
programme.desc: Former gunslinger George Temple (Glenn Ford) wants to keep his gun-fighting days a secret as he builds a new life. It seems whenever Temple's prowess with a gun is discovered, he and his wife, Dora (Jeanne Crain), have to skip town before someone challenges him to a duel. After eventually settling in a small town as a quiet shopkeeper, a drunken Temple makes the mistake of showing off his skills. When the criminal Vinnie Harold (Broderick Crawford) catches wind of it, a showdown is imminent.

programme.title: Blood on the Moon
programme.desc: Down-and-out cowhand Jim Garry (Robert Mitchum) is asked by his old friend Tate Riling (Robert Preston) to help mediate a cattle dispute. When Garry arrives, however, it soon becomes clear that Riling has not been entirely forthright. Garry uncovers Riling's plot to dupe local rancher John Lufton (Tom Tully) out of a fortune. When Lufton's firecracker of a daughter, Amy (Barbara Bel Geddes), gets involved, Garry must choose between his old loyalties and what he knows to be right.

programme.title: The Wyoming Kid
programme.desc: Slick gambler James Wylie (Dennis Morgan) is apprehended by the law and given the option to forgo a prison sentence if he poses as a bandit. His mission is to uncover the identity of the Poet, a notorious outlaw who has been holding up bank-owned stagecoaches and leaving verses at the crime scenes to taunt the authorities. James finds time to woo the Poet's lovely wife, Ann (Jane Wyman), who initially cold-shoulders him. But, as a romance develops, they partner up to find the robber.

programme.title: A Bullet Is Waiting
programme.desc: Storms trap a Utah sheriff (Stephen McNally) and his prisoner (Rory Calhoun) in a coastal cabin with a professor's daughter (Jean Simmons).

programme.title: The Brothers Rico
programme.desc: A businessman (Richard Conte) tries to warn his gangster brothers about a syndicate plot to kill them.

programme.title: The Family Secret
programme.desc: A young man (John Derek) kills in self-defense; his lawyer father (Lee J. Cobb) knows it but defends an innocent man.

programme.title: The Terror
programme.desc: A French lieutenant (Jack Nicholson) follows a ghostly beauty (Sandra Knight) to a baron's (Boris Karloff) Baltic coast castle.

programme.title: The Most Dangerous Game
programme.desc: Mad Count Zaroff (Leslie Banks) gives a shipwrecked couple (Joel McCrea, Fay Wray) a knife, then hunts them with hounds and a bow and arrows.

programme.title: The Little Shop of Horrors
programme.desc: A clumsy young man nurtures a plant and discovers that it's carnivorous, forcing him to kill to feed it.

programme.title: The Phantom of the Opera
programme.desc: A mad, masked composer holds a singer captive in the catacombs beneath the Paris Opera House and grooms her for stardom.

programme.title: Carnival of Souls
programme.desc: After taking a job as a church organist, the sole survivor of a fatal car crash encounters phantoms that lure her to a deserted carnival outside of town.

programme.title: 'Neath the Arizona Skies
programme.desc: A cowboy escorts a young half-Native American girl, whose mother has recently died. He must find her white father in order to claim her hefty inheritance.

programme.title: Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid programming.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Doc, Bat and several reformed outlaws team up to rescue Earp when the men of the Big T trap him in an abandoned cabin, leading to a desperate and deadly confrontation.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp agrees to resign to help Jim Kelley's chances at winning the mayoral election, but the replacement marshal soon faces a crisis when crooks trap Kelley in his store.

programme.title: Father's Little Dividend
programme.desc: Father (Spencer Tracy) hears Daughter (Elizabeth Taylor) is pregnant in this sequel to Father of the Bride.

programme.title: Deadly Companions
programme.desc: An ex-army officer accidentally kills a woman's son and tries to make up for it.

programme.title: Kazan
programme.desc: A Canadian government wildlife expert (Stephan Dunne) tames a white dog trained to fight by brutal masters.

programme.title: Montana Territory
programme.desc: A cowgirl vigilante (Wanda Hendrix) proves to a deputy (Lon McCallister) that the sheriff (Preston Foster) is an outlaw.

programme.title: Three Godfathers
programme.desc: In the desert, three Old West outlaws (John Wayne, Pedro Armendáriz, Harry Carey Jr.) adopt the baby of a dying woman.

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street
programme.desc: An adwoman's lawyer boyfriend tries to prove that Macy's Santa Claus, who claims to be genuine, is the real thing.

programme.title: Bachelor Mother
programme.desc: Polly Paris (Ginger Rogers) accidentally stumbles into motherhood after discovering an abandoned baby on the steps of an orphanage. Believing the baby is Polly's, department store owner J.B. Merlin (Charles Coburn) and his son David (David Niven) offer Polly a job -- but only if she takes responsibility for the child. Unemployed and in need of work, Polly accepts and all seems well, until her increasingly romantic relationship with David raises suspicions about the child's paternity.

programme.title: Father's Little Dividend
programme.desc: A year after dealing with a surprise engagement in Father of the Bride, Stanley Banks (Spencer Tracy) and his wife, Ellie (Joan Bennett), are in for another shock when they find their daughter Kay (Elizabeth Taylor) is now pregnant. Not ready to be a grandfather, Stanley keeps quiet while everyone else fawns over the mother-to-be and bothers her about baby names and nursery decorations. Ironically, his silence makes him the person Kay turns to the most for help, which in turn helps him.

programme.title: Christmas Mountain: The Story Of A Cowboy Angel
programme.desc: Inspired by an angel, an old cowboy (Slim Pickens) helps a widow and her children during the blizzard of '88.

programme.title: Bad Man of Deadwood
programme.desc: A cowboy (Roy Rogers) hides from his past in a fake professor's (George "Gabby" Hayes) medicine show and helps town outcasts fight civic reformers.

programme.title: Kazan
programme.desc: A Canadian government wildlife expert (Stephan Dunne) tames a white dog trained to fight by brutal masters.

programme.title: Montana Territory
programme.desc: A cowgirl vigilante (Wanda Hendrix) proves to a deputy (Lon McCallister) that the sheriff (Preston Foster) is an outlaw.

programme.title: Ministry - Your Words Have Power with Joyce Meyer
programme.desc: Your words hold incredible power; today, Joyce reveals how the things you say can impact your life in profound ways.

programme.title: Word of God Ministries
programme.desc: Pastor James McMenis and his wife Chrissy are dedicated to winning the lost to Jesus and making disciples of the saved. Their goal is to bring clarity to the Word of God, making it life-applicable to people everywhere.

programme.title: The Catholic Mass
programme.desc: The Heart of the nation Sunday mass brings the beauty and traditions of the Catholic faith.

programme.title: Perry Stone
programme.desc: Religious teachings from Perry Stone.

programme.title: Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid programming.

programme.title: Bachelor Mother
programme.desc: Polly Paris (Ginger Rogers) accidentally stumbles into motherhood after discovering an abandoned baby on the steps of an orphanage. Believing the baby is Polly's, department store owner J.B. Merlin (Charles Coburn) and his son David (David Niven) offer Polly a job -- but only if she takes responsibility for the child. Unemployed and in need of work, Polly accepts and all seems well, until her increasingly romantic relationship with David raises suspicions about the child's paternity.

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street
programme.desc: In this Christmas classic, an old man going by the name of Kris Kringle (Edmund Gwenn) fills in for an intoxicated Santa in Macy's annual Thanksgiving Day parade. Kringle proves to be such a hit that he is soon appearing regularly at the chain's main store in midtown Manhattan. When Kringle surprises customers and employees alike by claiming that he really is Santa Claus, it leads to a court case to determine his mental health and, more importantly, his authenticity.

programme.title: Three Godfathers
programme.desc: Thieves and rustlers Robert Hightower (John Wayne), Pete Fuerte (Pedro Armendáriz) and the Abilene Kid (Harry Carey Jr.) rob a bank in a small Arizona town. Pursued across the desert by the indefatigable Sheriff Buck Sweet (Ward Bond), the trio lose their horses, suffer injuries, and come across a stranded woman (Mildred Natwick) who is dying while giving birth. Promising to carry the woman's newborn to safety, the repentant criminals struggle to reach the village of New Jerusalem.

programme.title: Two Rode Together
programme.desc: For a fee, hard-drinking Texas marshal Guthrie McCabe (James Stewart) agrees to help Army officer Jim Gary (Richard Widmark) search for a group of whites who were abducted years earlier by Comanche warriors. After rescuing two of the abductees, McCabe and Gary find that the former captives have fully adopted the culture of their American Indian captors and are barely recognizable. Cultures collide as they attempt to return the settlers to their original -- and now long-forgotten -- lives.

programme.title: Going My Way
programme.desc: Father Charles O'Malley (Bing Crosby) is an easy-going, golf-playing young priest whose entry into a tough neighborhood parish in midtown Manhattan is viewed with skepticism from all quarters, especially the aging Father Fitzgibbon (Barry Fitzgerald). While dealing with some unfinished business from his former life in the form of an old flame who now sings at the Metropolitan Opera (Rise Stevens), Father O'Malley inspires the youth of his parish by forming a boys choir.

programme.title: The Bells of St. Mary's
programme.desc: Father O'Malley (Bing Crosby) is transferred to the Roman Catholic inner-city school St. Mary's, where he quickly falls into conflict with its headmistress, Sister Mary (Ingrid Bergman). Their primary disagreement has to do with the deteriorating school itself. Father O'Malley feels it should be abandoned and the children sent to other schools. Sister Mary and the other nuns, however, believe there is still hope, possibly in the form of charity from a wealthy business owner (Henry Travers).

programme.title: Tomorrow
programme.desc: In 1930s Mississippi, lonely Jackson Fentry (Robert Duvall) lives by himself as the sole caretaker of a sawmill. One day, close to the property, he discovers a young woman, Sarah Eubanks (Olga Bellin), who is three months pregnant. Since she was abandoned by both her husband and her family, Jackson takes her in. The two fall in love and get married just before her death. Jackson raises the child as his own, until the boy's uncles arrive to demand he be returned to the family.

programme.title: Half Shot at Sunrise
programme.desc: MPs in Paris chase two AWOL doughboys (Bert Wheeler, Robert Woolsey) posing as officers with the colonel's daughter (Dorothy Lee).

programme.title: A Tale of Two Cities
programme.desc: A woman unknowingly falls in love with the nephew of the man who condemned her father to imprisonment in the Bastille.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Man Between
programme.desc: (1953) Atmospheric thriller set in post-war Berlin, where Ivo Kern (James Mason) and Susanne Mallison (Claire Bloom) get caught up in a maelstrom of bigamy, blackmail and bullets.

programme.title: Gideon of Scotland Yard
programme.desc: (1958) Drama. Jack Hawkins stars as Police Inspector Gideon, who faces outrage and danger in his quest to bring London's criminals to justice. With Anna Massey, John Loder and Cyril Cusack.

programme.title: Footsteps in the Fog
programme.desc: (1955) Atmospheric Victorian melodrama. Stewart Granger plays a sinister aristocrat who poisons his wife. However, his maid (Jean Simmons) knows his secret and tries to use it against him.

programme.title: Dead of Night
programme.desc: (1945) Five uncanny tales of the supernatural in one eerie package, the most famous starring ventriloquist Michael Redgrave and a deadly dummy. Prepare to be spooked.

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of...
programme.desc: ...Unfortunate Events: (2004) Gothic family comedy starring Jim Carrey as the evil, scheming Count Olaf, who'll do whatever it takes to deprive three young orphans of their inheritance.

programme.title: The Pope's Exorcist
programme.desc: (2023) Supernatural horror starring Russell Crowe, loosely based on the memoirs of a 'real' exorcist. A case of demonic possession in Spain connects to dark secrets from the Inquisition.

programme.title: Warlock
programme.desc: (1989) Fantasy horror with Julian Sands and Richard E Grant. Using magic, an evil warlock flees to 80s LA from the olde-worlde. Can he unmake creation before a witch-finder tracks him down?

programme.title: The Masque of the Red Death
programme.desc: (1964) Horror with Vincent Price and Jane Asher, based on an Edgar Allen Poe story. Satanist Prince Prospero treats people like puppets. But he can't escape the coming plague.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Dr Who and the Daleks
programme.desc: (1965) A spin-off of the cult television series starring Peter Cushing. Backyard-inventor Dr Who finds himself stuck on the irradiated planet Skaro, home of the cold and metallic Daleks.

programme.title: Playing with Fire
programme.desc: (2019) Fun-filled family comedy starring John Cena. A macho fireman has to babysit three impish kids after saving them from a blaze in the remote California woodlands.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: (2018) Oscar-winning animated superhero adventure with the voices of Shameik Moore, Kathryn Hahn and Nicolas Cage. Can a gang of Spider-heroes save the universe from reality-bending chaos?

programme.title: Jerry & Marge Go Large
programme.desc: (2022) Fact-based comedy starring Bryan Cranston and Annette Bening as a retired couple who find a way to exploit a lottery loophole. But then some rich kids try to muscle in...

programme.title: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
programme.desc: (2009) Action adventure with Channing Tatum, Sienna Miller and Christopher Eccleston. Terrorists steal a devastating weapon and only the USA's finest - the GI Joes - can stop them.

programme.title: M3GAN
programme.desc: (2022) Creepy-doll horror with Allison Williams. A robotics engineer simultaneously invents an AI dolly and takes on the care of her orphaned niece. But can a cyborg really raise a kid?

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: (2021) Tom Hardy returns as Marvel's gnarly antihero, to face a symbiote spawned from Venom's own blood living inside a serial killer who looks just like Woody Harrelson. Yikes.

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: (2019) Horror based on Stephen King's novel. Seeking a quiet life, a family moves to a rural setting. But there's a road with speeding trucks and a pet cemetery that resurrects the dead...

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street
programme.desc: (1994) Festive family drama. Richard Attenborough stars as a department store Santa who insists he's the real Santa Claus. But can he prove it in court?

programme.title: First Knight
programme.desc: (1995) Romantic drama based on Arthurian legend, starring Richard Gere, Sean Connery and Julia Ormond. Can nomadic swordsman Lancelot contain his love for King Arthur's fiancée?

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the...
programme.desc: ...Fallen: (2009) Raucous sci-fi action sequel with Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox. Can Sam and Mikaela prevent the scourge of the Decepticon robots from destroying the Earth?

programme.title: One Day
programme.desc: (2011) Romantic drama. Jim Sturgess and Anne Hathaway star as friends whose lives intertwine and diverge over the years, after first meeting as graduates in 1988.

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: (2018) Ryan Reynolds returns as the potty-mouthed, can of whup-ass-opening superhero and now he's got buddies to help him take on baddie Josh Brolin in the all-out action comedy sequel.

programme.title: Good Boys
programme.desc: (2019) Coming-of-age comedy about three young boys embarking on a brand new, terrifying adventure: sixth grade. Girls, kissing and an epic four-mile journey await.

programme.title: Moneyboys
programme.desc: (2021) Gritty drama set in South China following the life of a male sex worker who must juggle the demands of his family, while keeping how he supports them a secret. In Mandarin/subs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: LumoTV: Deaf Funny
programme.desc: Comedy sketch show in BSL with a variety of characters, including a deaf man looking for love, a deaf spy and an interpreter. (Ep2)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Mandy
programme.desc: (1952) Poignant Ealing drama starring seven-year-old Mandy Miller as a deaf girl whose parents - played by Phyllis Calvert and Terence Morgan - fight over her treatment.

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: (1950) Western. John Wayne plays the commander of a Texan fort at which his ex-wife (Maureen O'Hara) pitches up. Can he win back her love by saving kidnapped children from Apache raiders?

programme.title: Father Brown
programme.desc: (1954) Crime-comedy starring Alec Guinness. A priest is tasked with accompanying a priceless religious artifact from London to Rome. But the prolific thief Flambeau is hot on his trail...

programme.title: The Colditz Story
programme.desc: (1954) Classic Second World War drama. John Mills, Lionel Jeffries and Bryan Forbes star as just some of the POWs determined to break out of the infamous German 'escape-proof' prison.

programme.title: Starman
programme.desc: (1984) John Carpenter's sci-fi romance with Jeff Bridges and Karen Allen. An alien is stranded on Earth, where he assumes the form of a widow's dead husband - and finds the locals hostile.

programme.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
programme.desc: (2022) Daisy Edgar-Jones stars in director Olivia Newman's adaptation of Delia Owens' best-selling novel about a feral child who's accused of murder in America's Deep South. Did she do it?

programme.title: How I Live Now
programme.desc: (2012) Saoirse Ronan and George MacKay star in director Kevin Macdonald's romance-thriller about a US teen who falls in love just as Europe tips into war. Very strong language.

programme.title: Petite Maman
programme.desc: (2021) Mystical drama. Eight-year-old Nelly meets a young girl playing in the woods behind her dead grandmother's house. And they seem to have an awful lot in common... In French/subs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Nicholas Nickleby
programme.desc: (1947) Drama with Derek Bond, based on Charles Dickens' novel. After his father dies, Nicholas seeks the help of his cold, avaricious, scheming uncle. Predictably, it doesn't go well.

programme.title: The Nevadan
programme.desc: (1950) Western with Randolph Scott and Dorothy Malone. A cunning US Marshal pretends to be a doofus to get a bank robber to take him to the hidden loot.

programme.title: The Bravados
programme.desc: (1958) Brooding western starring Joan Collins and Gregory Peck. A man hunts down the four escaped prisoners who he believes are responsible for the murder of his wife.

programme.title: The Winslow Boy
programme.desc: (1948) Anthony Asquith's drama based on a famous 1912 court case with Cedric Hardwicke as the father of a boy accused of theft who pursues the case to the highest courts. With Robert Donat.

programme.title: Made in Italy
programme.desc: (2020) Comedy-drama with Liam Neeson. An estranged father and son team up to fix up and sell an old Tuscan villa that their late wife and mother left to them.

programme.desc: A Grave Too Soon: Classic US detective drama. When an undercover detective is murdered, the investigation leads Theo to a Mafia boss out to avenge the death of his own sons. S3 Ep20

programme.title: Magnum, P.I.
programme.desc: The Aunt Who Came to Dinner: Classic US action drama series. Thomas is visited by his aunt Phoebe, a prize-winning playwright who claims that she is being stalked by a killer. S7 Ep19

programme.title: Magnum, P.I.
programme.desc: The People v Orville Wright: Classic US action drama series. When Rick is arrested for allegedly killing a hitman hired to murder his mentor, Thomas delves into a complicated case. S7 Ep20

programme.title: BattleBots
programme.desc: Put Up or Shut Up: US robot combat series. Eight of the field's most destructive bots vie for a kick at the Giant Nut as the World Championship tournament draws nearer. S6 Ep17

programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: The Frame: Classic US detective drama. Theo is falsely accused by bribery by a criminal and has to contend with an ambitious district attorney who is out to make a name for himself. S3 Ep21

programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: Deadly Innocence: Classic US detective drama. Theo's conviction that a hit-and-run incident which killed a police chemist was planned leads him to an imprisoned corrupt cop. S3 Ep22

programme.title: Made in Britain
programme.desc: Flymo Lawnmowers and Silent Night Mattresses: Learn how the hovercraft inspired one of Britain's best-selling lawnmowers, then how a bedmaker is giving us a good night's sleep. S1 Ep13

programme.title: Nijinsky's Triple Crown
programme.desc: A short sports film about the legendary racehorse.

programme.title: FIFA U-17 World Cup: England v Venezuela
programme.desc: Coverage as the England stars of tomorrow kick off their FIFA Under-17 World Cup 2025 campaign against Venezuela and look to do better than their showing in 2023.

programme.title: Hot Shots
programme.desc: A selection of the best hot shots from ITV Sport's snooker coverage.

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.desc: Mongolian Mauler: Extreme fisherman Jeremy Wade takes a trip to Mongolia to investigate a giant fish that is said to be one of the world's strongest fighters on a line. S4 Ep4

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Hobo Jack: US documentary series. After suffering from slow sales, Mike and Frank need to up their game and are led to a heavily overgrown property to meet 'Hobo Jack'. S2 Ep9

programme.title: The Motorbike Show
programme.desc: Henry Cole is at the Isle of Man TT as the legendary Norton attempt to make a return for the first time since 1992, and whatever happened to legendary Californian-style choppers? S2 Ep2

programme.title: Beat the Chasers
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as more contestants from across the UK try to take on The Beast, The Governess, The Menace, The Vixen and The Dark Destroyer and win big money.

programme.title: Pale Rider
programme.desc: Gripping western drama film starring Clint Eastwood and Michael Moriarty, 1985. A mysterious preacher protects a prospector village from a greedy and encroaching mining company.

programme.desc: Latest news from the world of entertainment.
